AT.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
AT.description: Das einzige Spiel im "Parody Runner" Stil für Wii U™. Trete der Zombie-Brigade bei und reise um die Welt, treffe interessante Leute und KNABBER AN IHREN GEHIRNEN. Spieleigenschaften: Rette die Welt in einem Zombie-Spiel im Parody Runner Stil. Das absolut schwerste Spiel im Runner Stil für Wii U. Infiziere jeden egal bei welchem Wetter. Einzelspieler, ein Spieler kann bis zu 8 Zombies auf einmal kontrollieren. Lokaler Multiplayer mit bis zu 5 Spielern. Lausche der nervigsten Kommentatorin aller Zeiten. Ernsthaft, sie ist wirklich schlecht. Flüssiges Gameplay bei 59.94 FPS. Ehrlich gesagt fällt es manchmal auf 58.93 FPS. Entschuldigung. Verwende viele nützliche Kleinigkeiten, Dingsbumse und Schnickschnack. Beseitige mächtige Illuminati Booossseeee wie Elvis und Lenin. Treffe die Illuminatist-Radfahrer-Terroristen. Kämpfe gegen den obersten Honcho Ninja aus Hong Kong. Stell dich dem Illuminati-Supersportwagen in Dubai entgegen.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Trailer

AU.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
AU.description: The only "parody runner" style game on Wii U™. Join the Zombie Brigade and travel around the world, meet interesting people, and BITE THEIR BRAINS. Game Features: Save the world in a zombie parody runner style game. Absolutely the most difficult runner style game on Wii U. Infect everyone, no matter the weather. Singleplayer, one player can control up to 8 zombies at once. Local multiplayer up to 5 players. Listen to the most annoying commentator ever. Seriously, she's really bad. Smooth gameplay at 59.94 fps. In all honesty, sometimes it drops to 58.93 fps. Sorry. Use many useful gewgaws, doodads, and knickknacks. Eliminate powerful Illuminati Bosssesss like Elvis and Lenin. Meet the Illuminatist cycliststs de terroriststs. Fight against the head honcho Ninja from Hong Kong. Face the Illuminati supersport car in Dubai.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Trailer

BG.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain

Singleplayer, one player can control up to 8 zombies at once. Local multiplayer up to 5 players. Listen to the most annoying commentator ever. Seriously, she's really bad. Smooth gameplay at 59.94 fps. In all honesty, sometimes it drops to 58.93 fps. Sorry. Use many useful gewgaws, doodads, and knickknacks. Eliminate powerful Illuminati Bosssesss like Elvis and Lenin. Meet the Illuminatist cycliststs de terroriststs. Fight against the head honcho Ninja from Hong Kong. Face the Illuminati supersport car in Dubai.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Trailer

BE.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
BE.description: Le seul jeu du genre "parody runner" sur Wii U™. Rejoins la Brigade des Zombies et voyage à travers le monde, rencontre des gens intéressants et MANGENT LEURS CERVEAUX. Caractéristiques du jeu : Sauve le monde dans une partie de zombies du genre "parody runner". C'est vraiment le jeu le plus difficile du genre "parody runner" sur Wi U. Contamine tout le monde, peu importe le temps. Joueur unique, un joueur peut contrôler jusqu'à 8 zombies à la fois. Joueurs multiples locaux jusqu'à 5 joueurs. Écoute la commentatrice la plus ennuyeuse de tous les temps. Elle est vraiment mauvaise. Une partie cool à 59.94 fps. En toute honnêteté, cela tombe parfois à 58.93 fps. Désolé. Utilise beaucoup de bibelots, accessoires et babioles. Élimine les puissants cheeeffffs Illuminatis comme Elvis et Lénin. Fais la rencontre des cycliiissstes Illuminatis terroriiissstes. Combats le grand chef Ninja de Hong Kong. Affronte la voiture supersport des Illuminatis à Dubaï.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade : No Brain No Gain bande-annonce

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Trailer

ES.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
ES.description: El único juego de estilo "parody runner" en Wii U™. Únete a la Brigada de Zombis y viaja por todo el mundo, conoce gente interesante y MUERDE SUS CEREBROS. Características del juego: Salva el mundo en un juego del estilo corredor parody runner. Realmente es el juego de estilo corredor más difícil en Wii U. Infecta a todos, sin importar el clima. Modo de jugador individual, un jugador puede controlar hasta 8 zombis a la vez. Multijugador local de hasta 5 jugadores. Escucha a la comentarista más molesta del mundo. En serio, ella es muy mala. Modo de juego suave a 59.94 fps. Para ser sinceros, a veces cae a 58,93 fps. Perdón por eso. Utilice un montón de útiles baratijas, adornos, y chucherías. Elimina poderosos Jefes Illuminati como Elvis y Lenin. Conoce a los ciclistas de los Illuminati, los terroristas. Lucha contra el jefe honcho Ninja de Hong Kong. Enfréntate al súper coche deportivo Illuminati en Dubái.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Tráiler

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain Trailer

IT.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain
IT.description: L'unico gioco di corsa stile parodico su Wii U™. Unisciti alla Brigada degli Zombie e viaggia in giro per il mondo, conosci persone nuove e MANGIA I LORO CERVELLI. Funzionalità di gioco. Salva il mondo in un gioco di corsa parodico sugli Zombie. In assoluto il più difficile di questa categoria su Wii U. Infetta chiunque, indipendentemente dal meteo. Modalità singola: un giocatore controlla fino a 8 zombie contemporaneamente. Multigiocatore locale fino a 5 giocatori. Ascolta il peggior commentatore di sempre. Davvero, è pessimo. Gioco leggero di 59.94 fps. In tutta onestà, qualche volta scende a 58.93 fps. Scusa. Usa tanti, utili cianfrusaglie, aggeggi e gingilli. Elimina potenti capi Illuminati come Elvis e Lenin. Incontra i terroristi Illuminati in bicicletta. Combatti contro il capo ninja di Hong Kong Affronta la macchina supersportiva degli Illuminati a Dubai.

movies.name: Zombie Brigade: No Brain No Gain trailer

Smooth gameplay at 59.94 fps. In all honesty, sometimes it drops to 58.93 fps. Sorry. Use many useful gewgaws, doodads, and knickknacks. Eliminate powerful Illuminati Bosssesss like Elvis and Lenin. Meet the Illuminatist cycliststs de terroriststs. Fight against the head honcho Ninja from Hong Kong. Face the Illuminati supersport car in Dubai.
